attributes.long-description:
Experience the BRUTALITY, GREED, LAWLESSNESS and LUST that was the West.

Extend the epic adventure that was GUN™ with many more story missions; be a bad ass gunslinger by taking down your enemies with new weapons and by using quickdraw mode for increased shooting accuracy; jump into a variety of quick-play modes including shotgun games, mission challenges and good old fashioned Texas Hold'em for a quick fix of GUN™ on-the-go; team up with your friends or go head-to-head in the wireless multiplayer mode which includes deathmatch, last man standing and more. To view the manual, please visit: http://www.activision.com/support.

attributes.name: Gun™ Showdown
